snippet.title: Top 20 Best Hero and Villain Rivalries of All Time
snippet.description:
From deadly cat-and-mouse games to epic battles spanning galaxies, the best hero-villain dynamics define pop culture itself. Join us as we count down the most iconic rivalries that have captivated audiences for generations! Our list features legendary nemeses from comics, films, TV shows, and literature who perfectly exemplify the eternal struggle between good and evil. Our countdown includes Sherlock Holmes & Professor Moriarty, Batman & The Joker, Obi-Wan Kenobi & Darth Vader, Professor X & Magneto, Superman & Lex Luthor, Harry Potter & Voldemort, and more! What's the greatest pop culture rivalry you've ever seen? Which fictional characters would you like to see fight one another? Let us know in the comments!
